setup.desc_short: Setup a channel to be used for counting.
setup.desc_long: Setup a channel to be used for counting. The bot will replace the users message with a webhook version. This prevents users from editing their message or deleting it.

count.desc_short: Check your count and the fonts you own.
count.desc_long: Check your count and the fonts you own. You can obtain counts by counting which is then used to buy fonts.

buy.desc_long: Buy fonts from the shop. Fonts are used to replace discord's normal text, spice up your counting channel.

shop.desc_short: See whats in the store to buy with your points.
shop.desc_long: See whats in the store to buy with your points. Buy fonts to replace discord's normal text, spice up your counting channel.

equip.desc_long: Equip one of your fonts. Fonts are used to replace discord's normal text, spice up your counting channel.

changeprefix.desc_short: Change the bot's prefix for this server.
changeprefix.desc_long: Change the bot's prefix for this server. Mentioning the bot is a permanent prefix

prefix.desc_short: Get the bot's prefix for this server.
prefix.desc_long: Get the bot's prefix for this server.

latency.desc_short: Get various latencies for the bot.
latency.desc_long: Get various latencies for the bot.

invite.desc_short: Get an invite for the bot, support server, and various other links.
invite.desc_long: Get an invite for the bot, support server, and various other links.

vote.desc_short: Get the links to vote for Counter in exchange for cool rewards!
vote.desc_long: Get the links to vote for Counter in exchange for cool rewards!

botinfo.desc_short: Get system and general information on the bot.
botinfo.desc_long: Get system and general information on the bot.
